message.content:
cs.CL, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper deals with sentiment classification, which is a natural language processing task, and proposes a new method for incorporating text attributes into the model. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). The paper also focuses on improving the performance of the model, which suggests that it could belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper proposes a new approach to attribute representation, which could fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also experiments with different locations to inject attributes, which could be relevant to cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
